95 #else
96 #define SL_CORE_EXPORT
97 #endif

101 #define _SL_JETSON_
102 #endif
103 #endif

106 #ifndef NOMINMAX
107 #define NOMINMAX
108 #endif
109 #include <Windows.h>
110 #define __CUSTOM__PRETTY__FUNC__ __FUNCSIG__
111 #define __FILENAME__ (strrchr(__FILE__, '\\') ? strrchr(__FILE__, '\\') + 1 : __FILE__)
112 #else
113 #include <unistd.h>
114 #define __CUSTOM__PRETTY__FUNC__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__
115 #define __FILENAME__ (strrchr(__FILE__, '/') ? strrchr(__FILE__, '/') + 1 : __FILE__)
116 #endif

118 #if defined(__CUDACC__) && defined(__CUDA_ARCH__)

120 #define IS_FINITE(x) isfinite(x)
121 #else
122 #define _FCT_CPU_GPU_
123 #define IS_FINITE(x) std::isfinite(x)
124 #endif

136  enum ERROR_CODE {
137  SUCCESS,
138  ERROR_CODE_FAILURE,
139  ERROR_CODE_NO_GPU_COMPATIBLE,
140  ERROR_CODE_NOT_ENOUGH_GPUMEM,
142  ERROR_CODE_CAMERA_NOT_DETECTED,
143  ERROR_CODE_INVALID_RESOLUTION,
144  ERROR_CODE_LOW_USB_BANDWIDTH,
145  ERROR_CODE_CALIBRATION_FILE_NOT_AVAILABLE,
146  ERROR_CODE_INVALID_SVO_FILE,
147  ERROR_CODE_SVO_RECORDING_ERROR,
148  ERROR_CODE_INVALID_COORDINATE_SYSTEM,
149  ERROR_CODE_INVALID_FIRMWARE,
150  ERROR_CODE_INVALID_FUNCTION_PARAMETERS,
151  ERROR_CODE_NOT_A_NEW_FRAME,
152  ERROR_CODE_CUDA_ERROR,
153  ERROR_CODE_CAMERA_NOT_INITIALIZED,
154  ERROR_CODE_NVIDIA_DRIVER_OUT_OF_DATE,
155  ERROR_CODE_INVALID_FUNCTION_CALL,
156  ERROR_CODE_CORRUPTED_SDK_INSTALLATION,
157  ERROR_CODE_LAST
158  };
159 
162 
169  static inline std::string errorCode2str(ERROR_CODE err) {
170  std::string output;
171  switch (err) {
172  case ERROR_CODE::SUCCESS:
173  output = "Error code: Success";
174  break;
175  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_FAILURE:
176  output = "Error code: Failure";
177  break;
178  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_NO_GPU_COMPATIBLE:
179  output = "Error code: No GPU Compatible";
180  break;
181  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_NOT_ENOUGH_GPUMEM:
182  output = "Error code: Not Enough GPUMEM";
183  break;
184  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_CAMERA_NOT_DETECTED:
185  output = "Error code: Camera Not Detected";
186  break;
187  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_INVALID_RESOLUTION:
188  output = "Error code: Invalid Resolution";
189  break;
190  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_LOW_USB_BANDWIDTH:
191  output = "Error code: Low USB Bandwidth";
192  break;
193  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_CALIBRATION_FILE_NOT_AVAILABLE:
194  output = "Error Code: Calibration File Not Available";
195  break;
196  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_INVALID_SVO_FILE:
197  output = "Error code: Invalid SVO File";
198  break;
199  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_SVO_RECORDING_ERROR:
200  output = "Error code: SVO Recording Error";
201  break;
202  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_INVALID_COORDINATE_SYSTEM:
203  output = "Error code: Invalid Coordinate System";
204  break;
205  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_INVALID_FIRMWARE:
206  output = "Error code: Invalid Firmware";
207  break;
208  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_NOT_A_NEW_FRAME:
209  output = "Error code: No New Frame";
210  break;
211  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_CUDA_ERROR:
212  output = "Error code: Cuda Error";
213  break;
214  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_CAMERA_NOT_INITIALIZED:
215  output = "Error code: Camera Not Initialized";
216  break;
217  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_NVIDIA_DRIVER_OUT_OF_DATE:
218  output = "Error code: Nvidia Driver Out Of Date";
219  break;
220  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_INVALID_FUNCTION_CALL:
221  output = "Error code: Invalid Function Call";
222  break;
223  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_CORRUPTED_SDK_INSTALLATION:
224  output = "Error code: Corrupted SDK Installation";
225  break;
226  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_INVALID_FUNCTION_PARAMETERS:
227  output = "Error code: Invalid Function Parameters";
228  break;
229  case ERROR_CODE::ERROR_CODE_LAST:
230  output = "Unknown";
231  break;
232  default:
233  output = "Unknown";
234  break;
235  }
236  return output;
237  }
239 
245  inline void sleep_ms(int time) {
246 #if _WIN32
247  Sleep((DWORD) time);
248 #else
249  usleep(time * 1000);
250 #endif
251  }
252 
255 
260  class SL_CORE_EXPORT String {
261  public:
262  String();
263  ~String();
264 
265  String(const String &str);
266  String(const char *data);
267 
268  void set(const char *data);
269  const char *get() const;
270  bool empty() const;
271 
272  String &operator=(const String &str1);
273  String &operator=(const char *data);
274 
275  operator const char *() {
276  return get();
277  }
278 
279  const char* c_str() const;
280 
281  size_t size();
282  void clear();
283 
284 
285  private:
286  char *p_data = 0;
287  size_t m_size = 0;
288 
289  void clean() {
290  if (m_size && p_data) free(p_data);
291  m_size = 0;
292  p_data = 0;
293  }
294  };
295 
300  template <typename T>
301  class SL_CORE_EXPORT Vector2 {
302  static const int nbElem = 2;
303  public:
305  union {
306  struct {
307  T x, y;
308  };
309  T v[nbElem];
310  };
312 
313  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ int size() const {
314  return nbElem;
315  }
316 
317  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector2() {}
318 
319  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector2(const T &t) {
320  this->x = t;
321  this->y = t;
322  }
323 
324  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector2(const T *tp) {
325  this->x = tp[0];
326  this->y = tp[1];
327  }
328 
329  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector2(const T v0, const T v1) {
330  this->x = v0;
331  this->y = v1;
332  }
333 
334  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector2<T>(const Vector2<T> &v) {
335  this->x = v.x;
336  this->y = v.y;
337  }
338 
339  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ const T *ptr() const {
340  return &this->v[0];
341  }
342 
343  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector2 &setValues(const T *b) {
344  this->x = b[0];
345  this->y = b[1];
346  return *this;
347  }
348 
349  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ T &operator[](int i) {
350  return this->v[i];
351  }
352 
353  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector2<T> &operator*=(Vector2<T>&itself, T d) {
354  itself.x *= d;
355  itself.y *= d;
356  return itself;
357  }
358 
359  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector2<T> &operator*=(Vector2<T>&itself, const Vector2<T> &b) {
360  itself.x *= b.x;
361  itself.y *= b.y;
362  return itself;
363  }
364 
365  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector2<T> &operator/=(Vector2<T>&itself, T d) {
366  if (d == 0) return itself;
367  itself.x /= d;
368  itself.y /= d;
369  return itself;
370  }
371 
372  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector2<T> &operator/=(Vector2<T>&itself, const Vector2<T> &b) {
373  itself.x /= b.x;
374  itself.y /= b.y;
375  return itself;
376  }
377 
378  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector2<T> &operator+=(Vector2<T>&itself, const Vector2<T> &b) {
379  itself.x += b.x;
380  itself.y += b.y;
381  return itself;
382  }
383 
384  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector2<T> &operator-=(Vector2<T>&itself, const Vector2<T> &b) {
385  itself.x -= b.x;
386  itself.y -= b.y;
387  return itself;
388  }
389 
393  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float norm() {
394  return sqrt(this->x * this->x + this->y * this->y);
395  }
396 
400  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float square() {
401  return (this->x * this->x + this->y * this->y);
402  }
403 
407  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float sum() {
408  return (this->x + this->y);
409  }
410 
414  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float dot(const Vector2<T> &a, const Vector2<T> &b) {
415  return (a.x * b.x + a.y * b.y);
416  }
417 
421  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float distance(const Vector2<T> &a, const Vector2<T> &b) {
422  return sqrt(pow(a.x - b.x, 2) + pow(a.y - b.y, 2));
423  }
424 
425  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector2<T> operator+(const Vector2<T> &a, const Vector2<T> &b) {
426  Vector2<T> tmp(a);
427  return tmp += b;
428  }
429 
430  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector2<T> operator-(const Vector2<T> &a, const Vector2<T> &b) {
431  Vector2<T> tmp(a);
432  return tmp -= b;
433  }
434 
435  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector2<T> operator*(const Vector2<T> &a, T b) {
436  Vector2<T> tmp(a);
437  return tmp *= b;
438  }
439 
440  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector2<T> operator*(const Vector2<T> &a, const Vector2<T> &b) {
441  Vector2<T> tmp(a);
442  return tmp *= b;
443  }
444 
445  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector2<T> operator/(const Vector2<T> &a, T b) {
446  Vector2<T> tmp(a);
447  return tmp /= b;
448  }
449 
450  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector2<T> operator/(const Vector2<T> &a, const Vector2<T> &b) {
451  Vector2<T> tmp(a);
452  return tmp /= b;
453  }
454  };
455 
460  template <typename T>
461  class SL_CORE_EXPORT Vector3 {
462  static const int nbElem = 3;
463  public:
465  union {
466  struct {
467  T x, y, z;
468  };
469  struct {
470  T r, g, b;
471  };
472  struct {
473  T tx, ty, tz;
474  };
475  T v[nbElem];
476  };
478 
479  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ int size() const {
480  return nbElem;
481  }
482 
483  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector3() {}
484 
485  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector3(const T &t) {
486  this->x = t;
487  this->y = t;
488  this->z = t;
489  }
490 
491  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector3(const T *tp) {
492  this->x = tp[0];
493  this->y = tp[1];
494  this->z = tp[2];
495  }
496 
497  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector3(const T v0, const T v1, const T v2) {
498  this->x = v0;
499  this->y = v1;
500  this->z = v2;
501  }
502 
503  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector3<T>(const Vector3<T> &v) {
504  this->x = v.x;
505  this->y = v.y;
506  this->z = v.z;
507  }
508 
509  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector3<T>(const Vector2<T> &v, const T d = 0) {
510  this->x = v.x;
511  this->y = v.y;
512  this->z = d;
513  }
514 
515  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ const T *ptr() const {
516  return &this->v[0];
517  }
518 
519  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector3<T> &setValues(const T *b) {
520  this->x = b[0];
521  this->y = b[1];
522  this->z = b[2];
523  return *this;
524  }
525 
526  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ T &operator[](int i) {
527  return this->v[i];
528  }
529 
530  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> &operator+=(Vector3<T>&itself, T d) {
531  itself.x += d;
532  itself.y += d;
533  itself.z += d;
534  return itself;
535  }
536 
537  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> &operator+=(Vector3<T>&itself, const Vector3<T> &b) {
538  itself.x += b.x;
539  itself.y += b.y;
540  itself.z += b.z;
541  return itself;
542  }
543 
544  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> &operator-=(Vector3<T>&itself, T d) {
545  itself.x -= d;
546  itself.y -= d;
547  itself.z -= d;
548  return itself;
549  }
550 
551  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> &operator-=(Vector3<T>&itself, const Vector3<T> &b) {
552  itself.x -= b.x;
553  itself.y -= b.y;
554  itself.z -= b.z;
555  return itself;
556  }
557 
558  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> &operator*=(Vector3<T>&itself, T d) {
559  itself.x *= d;
560  itself.y *= d;
561  itself.z *= d;
562  return itself;
563  }
564 
565  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> &operator*=(Vector3<T>&itself, const Vector3<T> &b) {
566  itself.x *= b.x;
567  itself.y *= b.y;
568  itself.z *= b.z;
569  return itself;
570  }
571 
572  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> &operator/=(Vector3<T>&itself, T d) {
573  if (d == 0) return itself;
574  itself.x /= d;
575  itself.y /= d;
576  itself.z /= d;
577  return itself;
578  }
579 
580  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> &operator/=(Vector3<T>&itself, const Vector3<T> &b) {
581  if (b.x != 0) itself.x /= b.x;
582  if (b.y != 0) itself.y /= b.y;
583  if (b.z != 0) itself.z /= b.z;
584  return itself;
585  }
586 
590  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float norm() {
591  return sqrt(this->x * this->x + this->y * this->y + this->z * this->z);
592  }
593 
597  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float square() {
598  return (this->x * this->x + this->y * this->y + this->z * this->z);
599  }
600 
604  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float sum() {
605  return (this->x + this->y + this->z);
606  }
607 
611  static inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float dot(const Vector3<T> &a, const Vector3<T> &b) {
612  return (a.x * b.x + a.y * b.y + a.z * b.z);
613  }
614 
618  static inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float distance(const Vector3<T> &a, const Vector3<T> &b) {
619  return sqrt(pow(a.x - b.x, 2) + pow(a.y - b.y, 2) + pow(a.z - b.z, 2));
620  }
621 
625  static inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector3<T> cross(const Vector3<T> &a, const Vector3<T> &b) {
626  Vector3<T> r;
627  r.x = a.y * b.z - a.z * b.y;
628  r.y = a.z * b.x - a.x * b.z;
629  r.z = a.x * b.y - a.y * b.x;
630  return r;
631  }
632 
633  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> operator+(const Vector3<T> &a, const Vector3<T> &b) {
634  Vector3<T> tmp(a);
635  return tmp += b;
636  }
637 
638  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> operator-(const Vector3<T> &a, const Vector3<T> &b) {
639  Vector3<T> tmp(a);
640  return tmp -= b;
641  }
642 
643  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> operator*(const Vector3<T> &a, T b) {
644  Vector3<T> tmp(a);
645  return tmp *= b;
646  }
647 
648  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> operator*(T a, const Vector3<T> &b) {
649  Vector3<T> tmp(a);
650  return tmp *= b;
651  }
652 
653  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> operator*(const Vector3<T> &a, const Vector3<T> &b) {
654  Vector3<T> tmp(a);
655  return tmp *= b;
656  }
657 
658  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> operator/(const Vector3<T> &a, T b) {
659  Vector3<T> tmp(a);
660  return tmp /= b;
661  }
662 
663  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector3<T> operator/(const Vector3<T> &a, const Vector3<T> &b) {
664  Vector3<T> tmp(a);
665  return tmp /= b;
666  }
667  };
668 
673  template <typename T>
674  class SL_CORE_EXPORT Vector4 {
675  static const int nbElem = 4;
676  public:
678  union {
679  struct {
680  T x, y, z, w;
681  };
682  struct {
683  T r, g, b, a;
684  };
685  struct {
686  T ox, oy, oz, ow;
687  };
688  T v[nbElem];
689  };
691 
692  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ int size() const {
693  return nbElem;
694  }
695 
696  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector4() {}
697 
698  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector4(const T &t) {
699  this->x = t;
700  this->y = t;
701  this->z = t;
702  this->w = t;
703  }
704 
705  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector4(const T *tp) {
706  this->x = tp[0];
707  this->y = tp[1];
708  this->z = tp[2];
709  this->w = tp[3];
710  }
711 
712  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector4(const T v0, const T v1, const T v2, const T v3) {
713  this->x = v0;
714  this->y = v1;
715  this->z = v2;
716  this->w = v3;
717  }
718 
719  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector4<T>(const Vector4<T> &v) {
720  this->x = v.x;
721  this->y = v.y;
722  this->z = v.z;
723  this->w = v.w;
724  }
725 
726  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector4<T>(const Vector4<T> &v, const T d) {
727  this->x = v.x;
728  this->y = v.y;
729  this->z = v.z;
730  this->w = d;
731  }
732 
733  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ const T *ptr() const {
734  return &this->v[0];
735  }
736 
737  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ Vector4<T> &setValues(const T *b) {
738  this->x = b[0];
739  this->y = b[1];
740  this->z = b[2];
741  this->w = b[3];
742  return *this;
743  }
744 
745  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ T &operator[](int i) {
746  return this->v[i];
747  }
748 
749  _FCT_CPU_GPU_ const T &operator[](int i) const {
750  return this->v[i];
751  }
752 
753  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> &operator+=(Vector4<T>&itself, T d) {
754  itself.x += d;
755  itself.y += d;
756  itself.z += d;
757  itself.w += d;
758  return itself;
759  }
760 
761  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> &operator+=(Vector4<T>&itself, const Vector4<T> &b) {
762  itself.x += b.x;
763  itself.y += b.y;
764  itself.z += b.z;
765  itself.w += b.w;
766  return itself;
767  }
768 
769  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> &operator-=(Vector4<T>&itself, T d) {
770  itself.x -= d;
771  itself.y -= d;
772  itself.z -= d;
773  itself.w -= d;
774  return itself;
775  }
776 
777  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> &operator-=(Vector4<T>&itself, const Vector4<T> &b) {
778  itself.x -= b.x;
779  itself.y -= b.y;
780  itself.z -= b.z;
781  itself.w -= b.w;
782  return itself;
783  }
784 
785  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> &operator*=(Vector4<T>&itself, T d) {
786  itself.x *= d;
787  itself.y *= d;
788  itself.z *= d;
789  itself.w *= d;
790  return itself;
791  }
792 
793  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> &operator*=(Vector4<T>&itself, const Vector4<T> &b) {
794  itself.x *= b.x;
795  itself.y *= b.y;
796  itself.z *= b.z;
797  itself.w *= b.w;
798  return itself;
799  }
800 
801  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> &operator/=(Vector4<T>&itself, T d) {
802  if (d == 0) return itself;
803  itself.x /= d;
804  itself.y /= d;
805  itself.z /= d;
806  itself.w /= d;
807  return itself;
808  }
809 
810  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> &operator/=(Vector4<T>&itself, const Vector4<T> &b) {
811  if (b.x != 0) itself.x /= b.x;
812  if (b.y != 0) itself.y /= b.y;
813  if (b.z != 0) itself.z /= b.z;
814  if (b.w != 0) itself.w /= b.w;
815  return itself;
816  }
817 
821  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float norm() {
822  return sqrt(this->x * this->x + this->y * this->y + this->z * this->z + this->w * this->w);
823  }
824 
828  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float square() {
829  return (this->x * this->x + this->y * this->y + this->z * this->z + this->w * this->w);
830  }
831 
835  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float sum() {
836  return (this->x + this->y + this->z + this->w);
837  }
838 
842  static inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float dot(const Vector4<T> &a, const Vector4<T> &b) {
843  return (a.x * b.x + a.y * b.y + a.z * b.z + a.w * b.w);
844  }
845 
849  static inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ float distance(const Vector4<T> &a, const Vector4<T> &b) {
850  return sqrt(pow(a.x - b.x, 2) + pow(a.y - b.y, 2) + pow(a.z - b.z, 2) + pow(a.w - b.w, 2));
851  }
852 
853  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> operator-(const Vector4<T> &b) {
854  Vector4<T> tmp;
855  tmp.x = -b.x;
856  tmp.y = -b.y;
857  tmp.z = -b.z;
858  tmp.w = -b.w;
859  return tmp;
860  }
861 
862  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> operator+(const Vector4<T> &a, const Vector4<T> &b) {
863  Vector4<T> tmp(a);
864  return tmp += b;
865  }
866 
867  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> operator-(const Vector4<T> &a, const Vector4<T> &b) {
868  Vector4<T> tmp(a);
869  return tmp -= b;
870  }
871 
872  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> operator*(const Vector4<T> &a, T b) {
873  Vector4<T> tmp(a);
874  return tmp *= b;
875  }
876 
877  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> operator*(T a, const Vector4<T> &b) {
878  Vector4<T> tmp(a);
879  return tmp *= b;
880  }
881 
882  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> operator*(const Vector4<T> &a, const Vector4<T> &b) {
883  Vector4<T> tmp(a);
884  return tmp *= b;
885  }
886 
887  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> operator/(const Vector4<T> &a, T b) {
888  Vector4<T> tmp(a);
889  return tmp /= b;
890  }
891 
892  inline _FCT_CPU_GPU_ friend Vector4<T> operator/(const Vector4<T> &a, const Vector4<T> &b) {
893  Vector4<T> tmp(a);
894  return tmp /= b;
895  }
896 
897  };

917  // access inner data by dedicated ref.
918 
919  struct {
920  float r00, r01, r02, r10, r11, r12, r20, r21, r22;
921  };
922  // ptr to inner data
923  float r[nbElem];
924  };

1279 #ifndef ZEDcudaSafeCall
1280 #define ZEDcudaSafeCall(err) __cudaSafeCall(err, /*__FILENAME__*/ __CUSTOM__PRETTY__FUNC__, __FILENAME__, __LINE__)
1281  static inline cudaError __cudaSafeCall(cudaError err, const char *func, const char *file, const int line) {
1282  if (err != cudaSuccess) {
1283  printf("in %s : cuda error [%d]: %s.\n", func, err, cudaGetErrorString(err));
1284  return err;
1285  } else
1286  return cudaError::cudaSuccess;
1287  }
1288 #endif
1289 
1290 #define TIMING
1291 #ifdef TIMING
1292 #define INIT_TIMER auto start = std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
1293 #define START_TIMER start = std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
1294 #define DEF_START_TIMER auto start = std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
1295 #define STOP_TIMER(name) std::cout << name << " " << std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now() - start).count() << " ms " << std::endl;
1296 #else
1297 #define INIT_TIMER
1298 #define START_TIMER
1299 #define DEF_START_TIMER
1300 #define STOP_TIMER(name)
1301 #endif
1302 }
